Sample CRM Notes - Australian Telecom Company
==============================================
This file contains sample PII data for testing the anonymization system.
All data is fictional and for testing purposes only.

--- CUSTOMER INTERACTION LOG ---

Date: 15/12/2024
Agent: EMP12345
Customer: John Smith

=== GOVERNMENT IDs ===

TFN Information:
- Customer's TFN: 123 456 789
- Tax file number: 987-654-321
- tfn 456789012
- TFN: 12345678 (legacy 8-digit)

Medicare Numbers:
- Medicare: 2123 45670 1
- Med card: 3456 78901 2/3
- Medicare number: 4567890123
- medicare 5678 90123 4

ABN/ACN:
- ABN: 51 824 753 556
- Australian Business Number: 12-345-678-901
- abn 98765432109
- ACN: 004 085 616
- Australian Company Number: 123-456-789
- acn 987654321

=== NBN/TELECOM IDs ===

NBN Location IDs:
- LOC000012345678
- Location ID: LOC123456789012
- LOC-000098765432
- nbn location LOC456789012345

NBN Service IDs:
- AVC000012345678
- CVC123456
- AVC-123456789012
- Service Class: SC21
- POI: 3SYD

=== PHONE NUMBERS ===

Australian Mobiles:
- 0412 345 678
- 04 1234 5678
- 0412-345-678
- 0412.345.678
- +61 412 345 678
- +61 (0) 412 345 678
- 61 412 345 678

Australian Landlines:
- 02 9876 5432
- (02) 9876 5432
- 02-9876-5432
- +61 2 9876 5432

Special Numbers:
- 1300 123 456
- 1800 654 321
- 1300654321
- 13 12 34

=== ADDRESSES ===

Street Addresses:
- 123 Smith Street, Sydney NSW 2000
- Unit 5, 42 Collins Road, Melbourne VIC 3000
- 5/42 King Avenue Brisbane QLD 4000

PO Boxes:
- PO Box 123, Sydney NSW 2000
- P.O. Box 456
- GPO Box 789
- Locked Bag 100
- Private Bag 200
- RMB 123
- CMB 456

=== DATES OF BIRTH ===

- DOB: 15/03/1985
- D.O.B: 25-12-1990
- Date of birth: 01.06.1978
- Born 15 March 1985
- born: 25 Dec 1990
- 1985-03-15

=== DEVICE IDs ===

IMEI Numbers:
- IMEI: 356938035643809
- Device ID: 123456789012345
- Handset: 359673012345678

ICCID (SIM):
- ICCID: 8961123456789012345
- SIM: 89640123456789012345
- SIM card: 8961098765432109876

NTD Serials:
- NTD-AB12CD34EF56
- NOKA12345678901234
- ALCL987654321098
- 2M1234567890
- Connection box serial: 3MABCDEF1234

=== NETWORK IDs ===

MAC Addresses:
- MAC: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF
- MAC address: 11-22-33-44-55-66
- Hardware address: AABB.CCDD.EEFF

IP Addresses:
- IP: 192.168.1.100
- Static IP: 203.45.67.89

=== PERSONAL INFO ===

Names:
- Customer name: John Smith
- Spoke to Mary-Jane O'Brien regarding account
- Account holder: Dr. Sarah Wilson

Email Addresses:
- Email: john.smith@example.com.au
- Contact: customer@bigpond.com
- test@optusnet.com.au

=== FINANCIAL ===

Bank Details:
- BSB: 062-000
- Account: 12345678
- BSB 033-042, Account 98765432

Credit Cards:
- Card ending: ****1234
- 4111 1111 1111 1111

=== END OF SAMPLE DATA ===
